org.apache.streams.twitter.api

Interface WelcomeMessages

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Twitter

    @Remoteable(path="https://api.twitter.com/1.1/direct_messages/welcome_messages")
public interface WelcomeMessages
    Interface for /direct_messages/welcome_messages methods.
    See Also:
    https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/direct-messages/welcome-messages/api-reference

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroyWelcomeMessage(Long id)
      Deletes a Welcome Message by the given id.
      WelcomeMessagesListResponse listWelcomeMessages(WelcomeMessagesListRequest parameters)
      Returns a list of Welcome Messages.
      WelcomeMessageNewResponse newWelcomeMessage(WelcomeMessageNewRequest messageNewRequest)
      Creates a new Welcome Message that will be stored and sent in the future from the authenticating user in defined circumstances.
      WelcomeMessage showWelcomeMessage(Long id)
      Returns a Welcome Message by the given id.

    • Method Detail

      • listWelcomeMessages

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/list.json")
WelcomeMessagesListResponse listWelcomeMessages(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                                                 WelcomeMessagesListRequest parameters)
        Returns a list of Welcome Messages.
        Returns:
        WelcomeMessagesListResponse
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/direct-messages/welcome-messages/api-reference/list-welcome-messages

      • showWelcomeMessage

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/show.json")
WelcomeMessage showWelcomeMessage(@Query(value="id")
                                                                                                   Long id)
        Returns a Welcome Message by the given id.
        Returns:
        WelcomeMessage
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/direct-messages/welcome-messages/api-reference/get-welcome-message

      • newWelcomeMessage

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="POST",
              path="/new.json")
WelcomeMessageNewResponse newWelcomeMessage(@Body
                                                                                                             WelcomeMessageNewRequest messageNewRequest)
        Creates a new Welcome Message that will be stored and sent in the future from the authenticating user in defined circumstances. Returns the message template in the requested format if successful. Supports publishing with the same elements as Direct Messages (e.g. Quick Replies, media attachments).
        Returns:
        WelcomeMessage
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/direct-messages/welcome-messages/api-reference/new-welcome-message

      • destroyWelcomeMessage

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="DELETE",
              path="/destroy.json")
void destroyWelcomeMessage(@Query(value="id")
                                                                                                  Long id)
        Deletes a Welcome Message by the given id.
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/direct-messages/welcome-messages/api-reference/delete-welcome-message
